code: import{atom,selector}from"recoil";var stocksAtom=atom({key:'stocks',default:[]});var stocksSelector=selector({key:'stocksChart',get:function get(_ref){var _get=_ref.get;var stocks=_get(stocksAtom);var volume=[];var open=[];var close=[];var high=[];var low=[];stocks.forEach(function(stock){volume.push(stock.volume);open.push(stock.open);close.push(stock.close);high.push(stock.high);low.push(stock.low);});return{title:{text:'Display Stock Data'},xAxis:{categories:volume},series:[{name:'open',data:open},{name:'low',data:low},{name:'high',data:high},{name:'close',data:close}]};}});export{stocksAtom,stocksSelector};
